data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Dundee United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Hibernian.
Corner awarded to Dundee United.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Hibernian in their own half.
Free kick for Hibernian in their own half.
Dundee United awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Don Robertson signals a Dundee United throw-in in Hibernian's half.
Dundee United to take a throw-in in Hibernian territory.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Dundee to check on Jamie Robson, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 6, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Paul McGinn.
In the minute 9, Can Hibernian get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dundee United's half?
The home team has substituted Jamie Robson with Adrian Sporle. Micky Mellon is thus making his first change.
Jamie Robson (Dundee United) gets a yellow card.
Goal kick for Dundee United at Tannadice Park.
Paul McGinn is back on his feet again.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Hibernian at Tannadice Park.
Throw-in for Hibernian in the half of Dundee United.
Don Robertson signals a Hibernian throw-in in Dundee United's half.
In the minute 12, Don Robertson signals a free kick to Hibernian just outside Dundee United's area.
Attention is being given to Hibernianâ€™s Martin Boyle and play has been suspended briefly.
Ball goes out of play for a Hibernian goal kick.
In the minute 15, Martin Boyle for Hibernian is back on the field again.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Don Robertson signals a free kick to Dundee United in their own half.
In the minute 18, Can Hibernian get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dundee United's half?
Hibernian are coming forward and Josh Doig gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Dundee.
In the minute 20, Free kick Dundee United.
Joe Newell (Hibernian) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Dundee United to take a throw-in in Hibernian territory.
In the minute 21, Don Robertson signals a free kick to Hibernian in their own half.
Hibernian awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Dundee United in the half of Hibernian.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Dundee United close to the penalty box.
Don Robertson awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Hibernian in their own half.
In the minute 25, Hibernian's Daryl Horgan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dundee United defender.
Don Robertson signals a free kick to Dundee United.
Alexander Gogic (Hibernian) has received a yellow card from Don Robertson.
In the minute 28, Can Dundee United capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hibernian's half?
In Dundee a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dundee United have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Hibernian in the half of Dundee United.
Hibernian have been awarded a corner by Don Robertson.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Don Robertson signals a Dundee United throw-in in Hibernian's half.
Throw-in for Hibernian in their own half.
Dundee United awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Hibernian is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hibernian's Kevin Nisbet is whistled for offside at Tannadice Park.
Throw-in for Hibernian at Tannadice Park.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Dundee United in the half of Hibernian.
Can Hibernian get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dundee United's half?
Throw-in Dundee United.
In the minute 38, Don Robertson awards the away team a throw-in.
In Dundee a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nicky Clark (Dundee United) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Dundee United.
Dundee United's Mark Connolly misses with an attempt on goal.
Don Robertson signals a throw-in for Dundee United, close to Hibernian's area.
In the minute 41, Throw-in high up the field for Dundee United in Dundee.
Don Robertson signals a free kick to Dundee United.
In Dundee Dundee United attack through Nicky Clark. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 42, Don Robertson awards Hibernian a goal kick.
Dundee United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dundee United to take a throw-in in Hibernian territory.
In the minute 43, Hibernian awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Dundee United.
Free kick for Dundee United in their own half.
In the minute 45, Hibernian are in shooting range from this free kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Dundee.
In the minute 45, Don Robertson signals a free kick to Hibernian in their own half.
Hibernian have been awarded a corner by Don Robertson.
Daryl Horgan of Hibernian gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Don Robertson awards Dundee United a goal kick.
The first-half is over at Tannadice Park.
Mark Connolly (Dundee United) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Corner awarded to Dundee United.
Can Dundee United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hibernian's half?
Dundee United have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Dundee United in the half of Hibernian.
Luke Bolton (Dundee United) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Hibernian at Tannadice Park.
In the minute 48, Don Robertson signals a Dundee United throw-in in Hibernian's half.
Hibernian push forward at Tannadice Park and Christian Doidge gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dundee United defence.
Dundee United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Dundee United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Dundee United in their own half.
Hibernian needs to be cautious. Dundee United have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 51, Hibernian needs to be cautious. Dundee United have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Hibernian goal kick.
Don Robertson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Hibernian at Tannadice Park.
Dundee United to take a throw-in in Hibernian territory.
In the minute 54, Adrian Sporle of Dundee United is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Hibernian in the half of Dundee United.
In Dundee Hibernian drive forward through Christian Doidge. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 56, Can Dundee United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hibernian's half?
The away team have replaced Daryl Horgan with Scott Allan. This is the first substitution made today by Jack Ross.
Dundee United are pushing forward but Ian Harkes's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the away team in Dundee.
Don Robertson signals a Hibernian throw-in in Dundee United's half.
Don Robertson signals a throw-in for Hibernian, close to Dundee United's area.
In the minute 60, Hibernian have been awarded a corner by Don Robertson.
Hibernian's Paul Hanlon breaks free at Tannadice Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Throw-in for Hibernian close to the penalty box.
In the minute 61, Ball safe as Dundee United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hibernian have a goal kick.
Don Robertson signals a free kick to Hibernian in their own half.
In the minute 63, Important block from the Dundee United defence as Kevin Nisbet fires in a strike for Hibernian.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Dundee.
Goal kick for Hibernian at Tannadice Park.
In the minute 65, Goal! Hibernian have got their heads in front thanks to a Christian Doidge strike.
Josh Doig instrumental with a fine assist.
Ryan Edwards is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in Dundee United.
In the minute 68, Lewis Neilson (Dundee United) has replaced the possibly injured Ryan Edwards at Tannadice Park.
Free kick for Hibernian in their own half.
In the minute 70, Throw-in high up the field for Hibernian in Dundee.
Kevin Nisbet of Hibernian smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Don Robertson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Dundee United in their own half.
Throw-in for Hibernian at Tannadice Park.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 72, Dundee United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Hibernian goal kick.
Dundee United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Dundee United make their fourth substitution with Logan Chalmers replacing Luke Bolton.
The home team replace Nicky Clark with Cammy Smith.
Dundee United drive upfield and Louis Appere gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hibernian defender.
In the minute 76, Dundee United's Ian Harkes is on target but unsuccessful.
Hibernian will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Dundee United.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Joe Newell for Hibernian who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 78, Jack Ross (Hibernian) is making a second change, with Melker Hallberg replacing the possibly injured Joe Newell.
In Dundee, Logan Chalmers of Dundee United is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Dundee United have been awarded a corner by Don Robertson.
In the minute 79, Can Dundee United capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hibernian's half?
Free kick in a good position for Dundee United!
Hibernian awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, At Tannadice Park, Logan Chalmers has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Hibernian to take a throw-in in Dundee United territory.
Throw-in for Dundee United in their own half.
In the minute 82, Calum Butcher (Dundee United) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Dundee United.
Corner awarded to Dundee United.
In the minute 83, Dundee United are pushing forward but Mark Connolly's finish is wide of the goal.
Hibernian have a goal kick.
Dundee United's Peter Pawlett misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 84, Don Robertson awards Hibernian a goal kick.
Don Robertson signals a free kick to Hibernian in their own half.
Don Robertson blows against Hibernian's Kevin Nisbet for offside.
In the minute 85, Free kick Hibernian.
Dundee United have a goal kick.
Hibernian have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a Dundee United goal kick.
Dundee United to take a throw-in in Hibernian territory.
Ball safe as Hibernian is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Dundee United in the half of Hibernian.
Dundee United have been awarded a corner by Don Robertson.
Dundee United have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Dundee United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hibernian's half?
Free kick for Hibernian in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dundee United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Don Robertson awards Hibernian a goal kick.
Free kick for Dundee United in their own half.
Hibernian push upfield but Don Robertson quickly pulls them for offside.
Don Robertson signals a Dundee United throw-in in Hibernian's half.
In Dundee a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
